function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Surging demand through most of 2020 caused by demographic trends and the pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to high population density","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures and encourage remote work to reduce population density","Technologies":"Remote work platforms, contactless technologies for real estate transactions","People":"Homeowners, real estate agents, potential buyers","Owner":"Local health authorities, real estate companies"},{"Description":"Lowest rate of home value appreciation since 2013","Impact":"Potential economic instability leading to lack of resources for public health measures","Mitigation":"Stimulate economic growth and investment in public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Economic stimulus programs, digital health infrastructure","People":"Local government, public health officials, homeowners","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Dominance of million-dollar cities in areas with attractive natural surroundings","Impact":"Increased travel and movement to these areas, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Monitor and regulate travel to these areas, implement public health checkpoints","Technologies":"Travel tracking systems, public health monitoring apps","People":"Tourists, travelers, local residents","Owner":"Local government, tourism authorities"}]}
